message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $140. I believe it offers excellent value at this price.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. I believe that's a fair price for the product, considering its value.
I understand your position, Bob, but I can't let go of the product for less than $135.  It's a very competitive price considering its quality.
I understand your position, but I'm still a bit hesitant at $135. Would you be willing to meet me at $132? I think that's a fair compromise.
